typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	FileName as string
}
source(output(
		InvoiceID as short,
		VendorID as short,
		InvoiceNumber as string,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp 'M/d/yyyy H:mm',
		InvoiceTotal as double,
		PaymentTotal as double,
		CreditTotal as short,
		TermsID as short,
		InvoiceDueDate as timestamp 'M/d/yyyy H:mm',
		PaymentDate as timestamp 'M/d/yyyy H:mm'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($FileName)]) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 derive(LastUpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['InvoiceID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
